name: Pompach
description:
You work in a battery filling factory and work every day to do it. It’s easy, you just have to follow the arrow.

Android / iOS : tap left or right of the screen depending on the arrow direction

PC : use left or right cursor key, Q / W or left / right Shift or Ctrl keys depending on the arrow direction

Mac : use left or right cursor key or Q / W depending on the arrow direction

Developped in Pascal Object under Delphi with it’s Firemonkey framework.
